caption:
Sometimes we return to the things we love to remind us of who we are. 💙

This past year brought some of the biggest changes of my life — a diagnosis of ADHD, depression, and C-PTSD, along with navigating a lot of new and more intensive ways of coping and healing. I carried a weight in my chest, a numbness I couldn’t quite describe, and an overwhelm of uncertainty – I knew, for the sake of my overall health, that I needed movement back in my life. 

I wanted a goal that was big, uncomfortable, and meaningful. A challenge to hold me accountable and reconnect me with running and myself. The NYC Marathon became that goal, @brasforgirlsorg became the “why”, and running once again became my safe place to land.

Thank you, @hoka, for giving me the platform to share my story and for the support every step (literally!) of the way. 💙 Link in bio to read the full blog!
